name: Room Escape: Journey of cabin
description:
The mysterious time traveler created the House of Wonder, filled with whimsical ideas.
There are many cabinets filled with suitcases.
When one opens any suitcase in the cupboard,
one will be sucked into different worlds for an exciting and interesting adventure.

Download this free escape game and you will get.

* 5 themed spaces with different styles
*Unique graphic design and scene style
*Brain-burning puzzles and fun mini-games

The game is free to play, no registration is required, 7 languages are freely switchable, and the user-friendly newbie guide will help you get started quickly. Don't hesitate to play and have fun!
